title: Great Works Begun There (2C9)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a Dwarf, you may discard the top 2 cards from your draw deck to take a [Dwarven] event into hand from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'Moria! Moria!… Long have its vast mansions lain empty since the children of Durin fled.'”
Rarity:	C
